channel.title: Lifestyle on Paul's Particles
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Paul's Particles

item.title: Granular Addition
item.description: If you are anything like me, you have lots of things you’d like to do with your time. It took quite some time to learn to say no to these ambitions, as there is definitely a limit to how much I can achieve in a given period. But we should still aim to challenge ourselves, and to say no is by no means to say never. Today I wanted to explain how I manage picking up and putting down projects.
